name: Invisimon
description:
The Priest has to banish the demon. Too bad he's invisible. And soon, all will be dark. 

This is a couch competitive game:

One player is The Demon, which is invisible. He moves with the arrow keys, he needs to turn off all the candles by standing by them for a bit.

Player two is The Priest. He needs to find and stomp the demon. He moves with WASD.

Press and hold Q to restart the game.

Made for Make Games JLM Jam 2019.

Amit Netanel - Codez

Ariel Bluman - Arts
